A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If Star Wars episode 7 was a good predictable retread of the same Star Wars formula we know and love then 8 is the opposite. It toys with our expectations and goes to new places and ideas not done before in a Star Wars movie. There were many great character developments that made the characters we love and the characters we hate much more complex and interesting. It still has the Star Wars whimsy and humor even in a story that was constantly threatening. It flips many expectations upside down and provided an incredible new story for old characters and new.
